/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements. A yellow taxi, a common sight in many cities, is seen driving down the street, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
